item.title: A Short Film I Inspired. (video)
item.description: My friend Steve doesn’t like social networks. He laughs at me every time I pull my phone out to tweet something. He made his first movie that he said I helped influence. Check it out… …LOL! I still believe that one day he will ‘friend’ me on Facebook or ‘follow’ me on Twitter so that our friendship will be finally be complete. :)
